body.p:
The XProc tab contains the following options:
XProc URL Specify the source XSL file to be used by the transformation by using the text field, drop-down list, Insert Editor Variables button, or Browse for local file drop-down list. You can also use the Open in editor button to open the specified file in the editor panel. This URL is resolved through the catalog resolver. If the catalog does not have a mapping for the URL, the file is used directly from its remote location.
Processor Allows you to select the XProc engine to be used for the transformation. You can select the built-in Calabash engine or a custom engine that is configured in the Preferences dialog box.
